attributes.additional_details:
Please make the Life saving drug Warfarien free on the NHS to anyone that needs it.

Why is the pill free but not a drug that is required to keep you alive??

What would be even better is to make all drugs that are considered to be life preserving to be free on the NHS indefinatley.

With increasing economic struggles people can no longer always afford their medication this results in them not taking it and then being admitted into hospital at further cost not just to theirs & theirs familys life but to the NHS.

Please make it fair for everyone and dont single out victims with blood disorders.

rejection.details: Please see: Free prescriptions for anticoagulants (Warfarin, etc)
